GSD.description:
scsi: scsi_debug: Fix type in min_t to avoid stack OOB

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.88 by commit bdb854f134b964528fa543e0351022eb45bd7346. For more details please see the references link.
